alert.note: Alert for Bonner; Boundary; Kootenai (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Hydrologic Outlook issued June 10 at 10:56PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...MULTIPLE ROUNDS OF RAIN FOR THE CASCADES...THE IDAHO PANHANDLE...THE BLUE MOUNTAINS THROUGH MONDAY... Several rounds of rain are expected through Monday across the region. One round is occurring now through Saturday for southeast Washington and northern Idaho, with widespread totals of 0.5 to 1.5 inches possible by Saturday evening. The second round of rain is expected Sunday night and Monday. Storm total rainfall of 2 or more inches is possible. Area creeks and streams will rise through the weekend and through next week. Swift current and cold water will be potential hazards for recreation along rivers and streams into next week. Minor rock slides may also occur in steep terrain. Burn scars will be particularly susceptible to mud and rock slides.
